subject: Weight Lifting
Steroids
Dietary Supplements and Herbal Remedies
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors began a preliminary investigation into the alleged use of banned substances by 11 Greek weightlifters, judicial officials in Athens said. The athletes’ suspended coach, Christos Iakovou, blamed a mistake by a Chinese drugmaker for a faulty batch of dietary supplements that led to the positive tests.
